message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the inflation is affecting me.
Bob, let's be reasonable. I'm offering you a bit more, but we need to settle this before inflation eats away at your share even more.
I'll take a smaller share than before, but I still think I deserve more than you're offering.
Bob, this is my final offer. Take it before inflation shrinks your share even further. It's a fair deal.
